aima.core.agent

Interface Percept

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FullyObservableVacuumEnvironmentPercept, PerceptStateReward<S>, RewardPercept
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AgentPercept, CellWorldPercept, DynamicPercept, LocalVacuumEnvironmentPercept, VacuumEnvironmentState

    public interface Percept
    Artificial Intelligence A Modern Approach (3rd Edition): pg 34.
    We use the term percept to refer the agent's perceptual inputs at any given instant.
    Author:
    Ravi Mohan, Ciaran O'Reilly
